title: Twilight Zone - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/12/19
itunes:title: Twilight Zone - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/12/19
description:
George Noory and TV writer and director Marc Zicree discuss his book and memories about the classic sci-fi TV show "The Twilight Zone," as well as the recent rebooted version.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
